name: Outstanding Powerless Heroes
description:
Do you want to have crazy powers? Take control of superheroes? Invade a lab filled with secret agents?

Look no further. This game will fill your needs. Whatever your playstyle, we have a hero in store for you.

GAME CONCEPT

Play as three superheroes and use your abilities in this 2D aerial game and unveil the secrets of the US governement. In this game, each hero has it's own ability and use them to counter the secrets agents and scientists offensive as they try to defend the lab and hide its deepest secrets.

Manipulate time, absorb bullets and much more but be carfeul to not to die! Else you will have to try it all over again with a different hero... But don't worry! Each death is an opportunity to adapt and find the best strategy possible to overcome you enemies.

FEATURES
  • Control up to 3 random heroes, each with its own special abilitie.
  • Avoid getting shot by the secrets agents.
  • Find your way around the lab and try to ecape.
  • Pay attention to your environment and discover the secrets the government hides.
  • Play mini-games to go through the levels.

CONTEXT

This game was created by 8 students of the Internet and Multimedia Institute during five days. During this Game Jam, our teachers gave us constraints that made the week very intense. Thus, during this Game Jam, we lost a Game Art and a Developer, our teachers moved them to another team. We also had the constraint of making a Hyper Casual mobile game, and we had to integrate it into our main game.

HOW TO PLAY?
  1.  Download the ZIP. file
  2. Extract the ZIP. file into another file
  3. Launch *Oustanding Powerless Heroes*, an Unity Application.
  4. Play the game and enjoy it!
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT
